feed.title: Manyfold Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.64.0
entry.content:
This release brings a range of accessibility, security and performance improvements, such as being able to select your language manually as well as automatically, and lots of other behind-the-scenes improvements and bugfixes.

What's Changed

‚ú® New Features ‚ú®

  • Manual control for interface language by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2077

üêõ Bug Fixes üêõ

  • Fix translation of pluralized model names by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2074
  • Fix right-click behaviour by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2080
  • Add plural forms for models in english by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2081
  • Fix error with unpaginated creators and collections by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2086
  • Fix missing buttons on model list by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2088

üõ†Ô∏è Other Improvements üõ†Ô∏è

  • Enable brakeman security analysis by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2067
  • Add brakeman gem for local analysis by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2068
  • Accessibility improvements from manual aXe testing by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2070
  • More translation updates by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2078
  • More translation tidying up by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2079
  • Change unassigned creator/collection into panels by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2082
  • Further translation tweaks by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2083
  • Reduce N+1 database queries by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2085
  • Optimise model list page by making permission lookup more efficient by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2087

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.63.0...v0.64.0

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.65.0
entry.content:
This release is all about improving accessibility after a recent audit. No new features as such, but if you're a screen reader or keyboard user you should find the site much easier to use. We now have skip links for large content blocks, proper tab ordering, better labels for links and buttons, and much more. We now use shape as well as colour to differentiate problem severity icons, which should help users with reduced colour vision.

What's Changed

üêõ Bug Fixes üêõ

  • Fix accessibility of upload page form labels by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2121
  • Add ARIA labels for pagination links by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2131
  • Fix tab ordering by moving sidebar later in DOM by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2138
  • Fix accessibility issues on image carousel by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2140

üõ†Ô∏è Other Improvements üõ†Ô∏è

  • Fix separate database env vars by @aneurinprice in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2116
  • A11y fixes for problem icons, including shape differentiation by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2120
  • Move breadcrumbs into a top-level nav for better accessibility by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2122
  • Improve bulk editor accessibility by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2123
  • Polish translation updates by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2124
  • Add a skip link to get to main content by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2125
  • Add skip links for large content blocks (models, creators, collections, tags) by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2129
  • Show constraints alongside password input boxes by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2130
  • Translation updates for Polish and French by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2134
  • Improve labels on a number of links and buttons, for screen readers by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2135
  • Improve labelling of metadata and filters by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2137

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.64.0...v0.65.0

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.66.0
entry.content:
On the surface, this release is mostly about more accessibility - keyboard controls for rotating 3d models, correctly-tagged languages, and colour contrast. But in order to do that, behind the scenes the 3d renderer has had a massive rewrite, and I hope you'll find it a lot faster and smoother to use!

What's Changed

‚ú® New Features ‚ú®

  • Enable keyboard control for 3d canvases by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2163
  • Improved keyboard controls for 3d views by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2165

üêõ Bug Fixes üêõ

  • Remove enforced strict loading in dev by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2159
  • Pass worker URL in as an attribute to avoid path problems by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2161

üõ†Ô∏è Other Improvements üõ†Ô∏è

  • Allow Manyfold to be in a same origin frame by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2153
  • Use Logstash JSON output format for production logs by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2154
  • Move 3d rendering to a background web worker by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2152
  • update xmldom to current version (via 3mf loader package) by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2160
  • Set 'lang' attribute on untranslated strings by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2162
  • Add health endpoint for uptime monitoring by @matthewbadeau in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2164
  • Improve colour contrast for problem list by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2167

New Contributors

  • @matthewbadeau made their first contribution in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2164

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.65.0...v0.66.0

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.66.2
entry.content:
Small hotfix to stop invalid filenames being created during 3MF export.

What's Changed

üêõ Bug Fixes üêõ

  • Fix invalid filenames in 3MF export by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2173

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.66.1...v0.66.2
